alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tipton and northeastern Shelby Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frayser, or near Millington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Ellendale, Frayser, Tipton, Atoka, Barretville, Griffin Corner, Woodstock, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville, Locke and Sloanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
